Text:
Listen to Osho Fluctuation Meditations.

That is explosion in Consciousness. There has never, in the entire history of mankind was anything as powerful.

If you can not enter the meditation state while listening to it, you are dead. Not a single meditation technique known to me can make it as clear. It is simply inevitable.

If you are not a meditator you may not even recognize you are in meditation and MANY times over. But that is OK. Just listen to it again, and again, and again. ANY Fluctuation Meditation will inevitably bring you to the state of meditation, the ultimate in human consciousness.

Osho was formerly known as Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh and his teachings led members of his cult to poison over 700 people in The Dalles, OR in 1984.  He changed his name after he was deported from the U.S., but his 'teachings' are the same - dangerous and insane.
